intro: Journey through round peg's magical world!
description:
Step into the enchanting world of Knights of the Round Peg, where players embark on a musical journey alongside a brave knight through 80 captivating levels.
Equipped with a lute and a quiver of musical notes, the knight bravely embarks on a journey, encountering peg-filled challenges along the way.
Players must strategically clear pegs at each level using a limited number of balls.
As you progress, you will have the opportunity to explore the beautifully hand-drawn map of the kingdom. 
Each level backdrop is filled with interactive elements to discover.

- go on a music filled journey
- 80 interactive hand-drawn levels
- addictive peg-breaking gameplay
